title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height does not change immediately.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Edit the label's font size to "18 points".
OB: The label's height remains unchanged after modifying the font size.
EB: The label's height should adjust accordingly when the font size is modified.
SR:
1. Add a label.
2. Edit the label's font size to "18 points".
3. Observe that the label's height adjusts accordingly to match the new font size.
